cheatsheet.title: Add the Test Case library to the Project

intro.description:
The next steps show you how to reuse external Projects in GUIdancer.
These external Projects are like libraries which can be reused in many other Projects.

item.title: Select the Project to reuse
item.description: Select the highest version of unbound_modules_concrete.xml

item.title: Enter the Project as a reused Project
item.description: Click the right arrow to reuse this Project in the currently opened Project
